snippet: If Andy Murray was grateful to Marin Cilic for facilitating his rise to the summit this month it was not evident as he added the Croatian to his lengthening list of victims at the ATP World Tour Finals on Monday....
lead_paragraph: If Andy Murray was grateful to Marin Cilic for facilitating his rise to the summit this month it was not evident as he added the Croatian to his lengthening list of victims at the ATP World Tour Finals on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Returning Hero Murray Masters Cilic, Nishikori Wins
headline.main: Returning Hero Murray Masters Cilic, Nishikori Wins
